wikipedia_page.main: David Paul Bennett (born 26 April 1960) is an English former professional footballer who played for Manchester City, Norwich City, MVV and FC Volendam, as a winger. In 1982 he made 15 appearances on loan with the Portland Timbers of the North American Soccer League.

response: * Dave Bennett (software) (born 1965), chief technology officer, Axway
